original: Berg, Olof Jonas Samuel, advokat, Göteborg, f. 17/5/93 Gbg av Nils Johan B. o. Anna Sofia Blomgren. G. 1. 22 m. Signe Landgren; 2. 34 m. Gurli Meisner. Barn: Margareta f. 25. — Avg:ex. fr. Gbgs hand:inst. 10, stud:ex. v. Gbgs latin 12, jur. kand. i Upps. 18. Löjtn. i Västg. reg. res. sed. 17. E. o. not. i Svea liovr., del-äg. i adv:firman Gust. Holms Inkas-sobyrå 21, inneh. av byrån sed. 29. Led. av Sv:es adv:samf. 25.
translated: Berg, Olof Jonas Samuel, lawyer, Gothenburg, born May 17, 1893, in Gothenburg to Nils Johan B. and Anna Sofia Blomgren. Married 1st: Signe Landgren in 1922 for 22 years, and 2nd: Gurli Meisner in 1934 for 34 years. Children: Margareta born in 1925. He graduated from Gothenburg's Handelsinstitut in 1910 and Gothenburg's Latin School in 1912. He received his law degree from Uppsala University in 1918. He was a lieutenant in the Västgöta regiment from 1917. He became a deputy notary public in Svea Court of Appeal and a partner in the law firm Gust. Holms Inkasso Bureau in 1921, and became the sole owner of the firm in 1929. He became a member of the Swedish Bar Association in 1925.
